Class PoisedProgram

java.lang.Object
PoisedProgram
public class PoisedProgram extends Object

Poised Program

The Poised Program is a project management system that the Poised Structural Engineering Firm can use to manage their projects.

The program will be used to: 路 Add new projects to their folio of work 路 Make modifications to existing projects/contractors 路 View overdue and unfinished projects 路 Finalise projects

It will read existing projects from a text file and save any changes to the projects text file. It also creates an Array to store projects in.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Calum Gilchrist

      public static final Scanner sc

  • Constructor Details

    • PoisedProgram

      public PoisedProgram()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Will run the methods to read the projects from file into the program before running the main menu method

    • mainMenu

      public static void mainMenu(Scanner sc)
      Gets the users choice from the displayed menu method and then triggers the appropriate action. It will write projects to file when the user chooses to 'exit'.

    • addProject

      public static void addProject()
      Creates a new 'project' object by first gathering all required information from the user, including triggering the 'person' class to gather information about these. It will also display the project on the screen when it has been created.

    • getDate

      public static LocalDate getDate(String date)
      Changes the date from a String to a Date so that calculations can be done on it
      Parameters:
      date - the date in String format
      Returns:
      the date in LocalDate format

    • addPerson

      public static Person addPerson(String role)
      Creates a person. This will gather the information about the person from the user
      Parameters:
      role - passes whether it is Architect, Contractor or Customer
      Returns:
      the Person object

    • amendDueDate

      public static void amendDueDate()
      Modifies the due date of a selected project

    • updateAmountPaid

      public static void updateAmountPaid()
      Add an amount paid by the customer for a job. Displays amount still owed.

    • updateContractorDetails

      public static void updateContractorDetails()
      Make amendments to the details stored for a particular Contractor.

    • updateProject

      public static void updateProject()
      Make amendments to elements of the project Change either the name, type, address, erf no. or the total fee.

    • viewOverdueProjects

      public static void viewOverdueProjects()
      Displays all the projects that their due dates have passed.

    • viewUnfinishedProjects

      public static void viewUnfinishedProjects()
      Displays the projects which are marked unfinished.

    • finaliseProject

      public static void finaliseProject()
      Marks a project as complete. Will also generate amount still owed by the customer.

    • promptEnterKey

      public static void promptEnterKey(Scanner sc)
      Has the user hit 'Enter' before returning to main menu.
